hero_subtitle: Students and seniors together under one roof. A unique opportunity for intergenerational connection and affordable housing.
how_it_works_step1_desc: Students and care homes can register via our platform.
how_it_works_step2_desc: We ensure the right match between students and care homes.
how_it_works_step3_desc: Students live in the care home and contribute to the community.
testimonial1_quote: "As a student, I found a nice place to live and learn a lot from the elderly. The contact is valuable and I really feel part of the community."
testimonial2_quote: "The presence of students brings life to the place. They are so enthusiastic and help us with all kinds of activities. It is an enrichment for all of us."
cta_subtitle: Join our network of care homes, students, and municipalities working together for a better future.
map_loading_message: We are currently active in various cities in the Netherlands. Check out where you can find us!
